sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Boil milk in a large pot. 2. Add lemon juice and stir until milk curdles. 3. Strain the curdled milk through a cheesecloth to separate the whey from the curd. 4. Rinse the curd under cold water to remove any trace of lemon juice. 5. Squeeze out excess water from the curd. 6. Knead the curd into a smooth dough. 7. Divide the dough into small balls and flatten them slightly. 8. In a separate pot, combine sugar, water, cardamom pods, and rose water. Bring to a boil. 9. Add the flattened dough balls to the boiling syrup. 10. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. 11. Remove from heat and let them cool. 12. Garnish with chopped pistachios before serving.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort/> <image/> <ingredients>Milk (1 liter), Lemon Juice (2 tbsp), Su</ingredients> <meal_type/> <name>Rasgulla</name> <nutrition>Calories: 150, Protein: 5g, Fat: 5g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Boil milk and curdle with lemon juice. 2. Prepare sugar syrup.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
